item.title: NEE
item.description: score:-8 Chances: Bullish views on NextEra Energy as a smart bet on green energy and rising payout. Strong performance in renewable energy sector and positive outlook. Better value option compared to competitors. Dividend growth and strong track record of raising payouts. Positive market response to insider activity and strong earnings results.

item.title: RUN
item.description: score:53 Chances: Positive earnings results with EPS beating expectations and strong Q2 performance. Expansion of collaboration with PG&E and readiness for emergency demand response program. Partnerships with housing organizations to provide solar installations for renters. Growing interest and investments in renewable energy stocks.
